divs: sighting detailsmy wife used to sit outside with the neighbors in the evenings till we moved . at approximately 10:05 pm my daughter came in to tell me that her mom had saw a ufo , i was like whatever . if she saw a ufo she would come in to tell me herself . so sure enough about 10 to 15 minutes later she came in saying she saw ufo and now jets were flying all over the place . so i went outside and saw about 5 to 10 jets flying all over the place they soon started dropping flares in the area where my wife had saw the object . this was seen by about 6 adults and 4 or 5 children my wife wasn't shaken at all by the ufo , but the jets had scared her . she said when she saw it it was like she had always known . this is her second time seeing one , the other was in milwaukee in 2007 . the neighbors on the other hand were clearly shaken by what they had seen. they all said that the jets that were dropping the flares was not what they had just witnessed . they described it as being a soft ball sized like fire ball that popped up then disappeared then popped up again in a different location . it lasted about 15 minutes till the jets showed up . they said that the ufo was much bigger than the flares that were being dropped by the jets . while the jets were flying all over i was looking all over the sky cause i wanted to see what they had . i looked straight up and i saw what looked like a star moving directly above me but it was real far away . i pointed it out to my wife she saw it to . it was moving straight , then it like pulsed and disappeared . by pulsed i mean it had the star like light then an outer light not as bright around it kind of like a fried egg the yolk being the brighter light it was weird . i'm not sure if what i saw was a ufo , but ive never seen anything like it before . i didnt go outside to get pictures of the fire ball that they saw , but i did take pictures of the jets dropping the flares . the reason why i didnt report this to you guys sooner is i didnt know about this site . i did however report it to this guy http:\\www.ufoguy.com on friday, july 25, 2008 at 2:55 pm i still have the e-mail in my inbox the story is on his web page . we werent the only people to see it that day . bill kind of took what i said out of context and said my pics were of ufo's i didnt like that to much . you have to zoom in on the photo because my camera isnt the best .
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Peru
There was one other sighting in Peru on or around July 24th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO followed by jets dropping flares .
